Actions.Text: ----------------------------------------------------------------# Auth: Christopher Stone# dCre: 2018/04/10 03:00# dMod: 2018/04/10 03:22# Appl: AppleScriptObjC# Task: Return Keyboard Maestro Version and macOS System Version# Libs: None# Osax: None# Tags: @Applescript, @Script, @ASObjC, @Paste, @Keyboard_Maestro, @MacOS, @System, @Versions----------------------------------------------------------------use AppleScript version "2.4"use framework "Foundation"use scripting additions----------------------------------------------------------------set appBundleID to "com.stairways.keyboardmaestro.editor"set theURL to current application's NSWorkspace's sharedWorkspace()'s URLForApplicationWithBundleIdentifier:appBundleIDset appInfoPlist to ((theURL as text) & "Contents:Info.plist")set AppleScript's text item delimiters to " "set sysVerStr to current application's NSProcessInfo's processInfo()'s operatingSystemVersionString()set sysVerStr to text item 2 of (sysVerStr as text)set appInfoPlist to POSIX path of appInfoPlistset theDict to current application's NSDictionary's dictionaryWithContentsOfFile:appInfoPlistset verStr to ("Keyboard Maestro " & (theDict's valueForKeyPath:"CFBundleShortVersionString") as text) & ¬	" on macOS " & (system version of (get system info))return verStr----------------------------------------------------------------

Name: KM Version and macOS System Version
